attributes.action: prosecute any MP who made a false expense claim for fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In any other walk of life, fraud would be a criminal case. I therefore request that any MP who has made a fraudulent expense claim, especially in the cases where claims were made for non-existant mortgages and loans, etc. be prosecuted, as any ordinary member of the public would be.

rejection.details: The PM can not prosecute an individual. This is a matter for the police.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
